title: Lemon poppy seed biscuits
ingredients: ['375g plain flour', '60g poppy seeds', '1 1/2 teaspoons baking powder', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '225g butter, softened', '125g caster sugar', '1 egg, separated', '2 tablespoons lemon zest', '4 tablespoons lemon juice', '3 or 4 tablespoons caster sugar, for decoration']
